IMDb data; ttnr: 0119217, Title: Good Will Hunting, --- Description: Good Will Hunting: Directed by Gus Van Sant. With Matt Damon, Ben Affleck, Stellan Skarsgård, John Mighton. Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119217/","name":"Good Will Hunting","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTI0MzcxMTYtZDVkMy00NjY1LTgyMTYtZmUxN2M3NmQ2NWJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119217/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"gufando","dateCreated":"2006-03-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Incredible, moving movie.","reviewBody":"A lot of things have been said about this fantastic movie, and I only hope to add a few more praises.

The fact that it was written by Ben and Matt was a shock to me, I did not expect any strong writing and a solid script, but boy was I wrong. The movie lasts for 2 hours, and every minute of it I couldn't even focus on anything beside the incredible world of Will Hunting.

Matt plays Will Hunting, who is a brilliant young man who denies his unreal intellect. Will has had a very abusive childhood which hurt him mentally to a point where he can no longer let anyone close to him aside from his best friend who is played by Ben. That is until a professor at one of the top colleges finds Will's talent and helps him out of trouble with the law. Robin Williams later comes in as a therapist to Will, he is the only one who can really stand up to Will's intellect and manages to break the layer of distrust that Will has developed over years of solitude, and the two develop a bond beyond friendship.

Yes there is a girl, but this is not a romantic movie. There is more to life then what we are taught and what we have to show for it.

The writing is witty, brilliant and hilarious at times, both Matt and Robin Williams preform wonderfully from both a comedic and theatrical prospective. Matt's best work since Dogma and Williams best along side Dead Poet's Society.

If your looking for a typical Hollywood movie with a Hollywood ending, then do not bother spending two hours on this movie. This movie is ahead of it's time, and lands an easy 10 out of 10.

This one is a keeper in my movie library.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":898927,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1998-01-09","keywords":"professor,genius,mathematical genius,loss of wife,friend","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Good Will Hunting","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1281211929","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTc2MjE1YTItNWIyYy00YTA4LWE1MWMtODA0MDM1NTVlNjcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTc2MjE1YTItNWIyYy00YTA4LWE1MWMtODA0MDM1NTVlNjcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000245/","name":"Robin Williams","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000354/","name":"Matt Damon","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001814/","name":"Gus Van Sant"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031032/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093776/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000354/","name":"Matt Damon","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck"],"duration":"PT2H6M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: H Is for Happiness
Szczęściara
H Is for Happiness
programme.desc: H Is for Happiness: Directed by John Sheedy. With Miriam Margolyes, Daisy Axon, Alessandra Tognini, Talissa Mansfield. A twelve year old girl with boundless optimism and a unique view of the world, is inspired by the strange new boy at school and sets out to mend her broken family - whatever it takes." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6943854/","name":"H Is for Happiness","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTM0YjIwOWItNjllOC00YjRlLTgwZDEtOTQxYzE4ZjRhMGI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjI3NzU3ODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A twelve year old girl with boundless optimism and a unique view of the world, is inspired by the strange new boy at school and sets out to mend her broken family - whatever it takes.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6943854/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"SnoopyStyle"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"cute sweet sincere","reviewBody":"Candice Phee is an outspoken 13 year old who gets ridiculed by the rest of the class especially mean girl Jen Marshall. Despite her aggressive happiness, her home life is dysfunctional. Her mother is depressed after the death of Candice's baby sister three years earlier. Her father is angry at his rich brother whom he believes to have stolen his great idea. New kid Douglas Benson believes that he's from another dimension and falls for Candice right away. Their wonky-eyed teacher assigns the class project Life as an Alphabet.\n\nThis is cute. I don't recognize any of the actors although Emma Booth seems familiar. The kids are newcomers. Daisy Axon has the eagerness even if she's unpolished. The acting is generally fine with good sincerity. The story is a little over-stuffed. It seems every character has a story in this movie. This is cute, sweet, and sincere. The filmmaking is good. With so many things going on, the emotional arc gets a bit muddled but the sweetness is never far away. That has a lot to do with little Daisy.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":445,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"genre":["Family"],"datePublished":"2020-02-06","keywords":"broken family,12 year old girl,happiness,school,boy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3579887385","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxOWI4MGEtNzBlZS00YWZjLWIzZTgtZTkwZjg1Njg1OTFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxOWI4MGEtNzBlZS00YWZjLWIzZTgtZTkwZjg1Njg1OTFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0546816/","name":"Miriam Margolyes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10249083/","name":"Daisy Axon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10295401/","name":"Alessandra Tognini"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2368564/","name":"John Sheedy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0261726/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0692057/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1124469/","name":"Lisa Hoppe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11812666/","name":"Barry Jonsberg"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: A Night at the Roxbury
Odlotowy duet
A Night at the Roxbury
programme.desc:
A Night at the Roxbury: Directed by John Fortenberry. With Will Ferrell, Chris Kattan, Raquel Gardner, Viveca Paulin. Two dim-witted brothers dream of owning their own dance club or at least getting into the coolest and most exclusive club in town, The Roxbury." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120770/","name":"A Night at the Roxbury","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTczZmEyYWMtMTE5MC00YzcyLWJhMDAtZDA5Mzg2YmQwNWQyL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two dim-witted brothers dream of owning their own dance club or at least getting into the coolest and most exclusive club in town, The Roxbury.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120770/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tbaby2290"},"dateCreated":"2004-05-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good to the last laugh...","reviewBody":"Apparently, not many people are being very fair about the movie, by rating it at 1 or 2 on scale up to 10. Please people, understand that this movie was not made to get Oscars, or Grammys, it was made for the people entertainment, so don't go off giving that crap about "i dont like will ferrell or chris kattan so it sucked" cause if you don't like them, DONT WATCH THE MOVIE IN THE FIRST PLACE! as simple as that.

 I myself am very fond of this movie. I think it is a great comedy, and sure it's not for the whole family, in fact, I'd only recommend it to people who enjoy the stupid comedy on Saturday Night Live.

The movie basically goes like this - Doug (Chris Kattan) and Steve Butabi (Will Ferrell) are brothers that try to get into the town's best night club, the Roxbury. Although they aren't successful entering the club on their own, they get help when actor Richard Greico's fancy little sport car rams into the back of Doug and Steve's van. Richard doesn't want the boys to sue him, so he invites them all into the Roxbury as a little appology for the car damage. Doug and Steve meet a few "foxy" ladies, get their freak on with them, and get rejected by them. harsh harsh. then the guys get in a huge argument about all the unfortunate events that happened that day, and doug ends up moving out of their bedroom into the guesthouse right nextdoor. and as steve puts it "I just miss doug" dad says "well he's right next door and that things like a mansion!" steve says "but theres no cable" dad says "sure there is." steve says "BUT THERE'S NO HBO!" haha yeah anyways, steve begings dating the college girl that works in her dad's lamp store next to the brothers father's flower shop. the dad had always been trying to hook steve and the girl up, so in the end they're getting married and.. yeah, you watch the rest yourself.

The music choices in the movie were awesome, pure awesome. the cd is G for Great! anyone who has seen this movie and hates it, hasn't paid enough attention to it. Stop looking for the negatives, and you'll see how funny this movie really is. It isn't meant for the big award shows, remember, it's made for "fun, comedy and entertainment." if you don't enjoy any of those things, DON'T WATCH IT. and DON'T HATE will ferrell or chris kattan, cause they're my homeboys and I love them.

Two dim-witted brothers dream of owning their own dance club or at least getting into the coolest and most exclusive club in town, The Roxbury." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120770/","name":"A Night at the Roxbury","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTczZmEyYWMtMTE5MC00YzcyLWJhMDAtZDA5Mzg2YmQwNWQyL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two dim-witted brothers dream of owning their own dance club or at least getting into the coolest and most exclusive club in town, The Roxbury.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120770/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"tbaby2290","dateCreated":"2004-05-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good to the last laugh...","reviewBody":"Apparently, not many people are being very fair about the movie, by rating it at 1 or 2 on scale up to 10. Please people, understand that this movie was not made to get Oscars, or Grammys, it was made for the people entertainment, so don't go off giving that crap about "i dont like will ferrell or chris kattan so it sucked" cause if you don't like them, DONT WATCH THE MOVIE IN THE FIRST PLACE! as simple as that.

 I myself am very fond of this movie. I think it is a great comedy, and sure it's not for the whole family, in fact, I'd only recommend it to people who enjoy the stupid comedy on Saturday Night Live.

The movie basically goes like this - Doug (Chris Kattan) and Steve Butabi (Will Ferrell) are brothers that try to get into the town's best night club, the Roxbury. Although they aren't successful entering the club on their own, they get help when actor Richard Greico's fancy little sport car rams into the back of Doug and Steve's van. Richard doesn't want the boys to sue him, so he invites them all into the Roxbury as a little appology for the car damage. Doug and Steve meet a few "foxy" ladies, get their freak on with them, and get rejected by them. harsh harsh. then the guys get in a huge argument about all the unfortunate events that happened that day, and doug ends up moving out of their bedroom into the guesthouse right nextdoor. and as steve puts it "I just miss doug" dad says "well he's right next door and that things like a mansion!" steve says "but theres no cable" dad says "sure there is." steve says "BUT THERE'S NO HBO!" haha yeah anyways, steve begings dating the college girl that works in her dad's lamp store next to the brothers father's flower shop. the dad had always been trying to hook steve and the girl up, so in the end they're getting married and.. yeah, you watch the rest yourself.

The music choices in the movie were awesome, pure awesome. the cd is G for Great! anyone who has seen this movie and hates it, hasn't paid enough attention to it. Stop looking for the negatives, and you'll see how funny this movie really is. It isn't meant for the big award shows, remember, it's made for "fun, comedy and entertainment." if you don't enjoy any of those things, DON'T WATCH IT. and DON'T HATE will ferrell or chris kattan, cause they're my homeboys and I love them.

programme.title: Blades of Glory
Ostrza chwały
Blades of Glory
programme.desc:
Blades of Glory: Directed by Josh Gordon, Will Speck. With Will Ferrell, Jon Heder, Will Arnett, Amy Poehler. In 2002, two rival Olympic ice skaters were stripped of their gold medals and permanently banned from men's single competition. Presently, however, they've found a loophole that will allow them to qualify as a pairs team." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0445934/","name":"Blades of Glory","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY3MDMyMTYxMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjk0NzI0MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 2002, two rival Olympic ice skaters were stripped of their gold medals and permanently banned from men's single competition. Presently, however, they've found a loophole that will allow them to qualify as a pairs team.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0445934/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"snow0r"},"dateCreated":"2007-04-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fantastically Overblown","reviewBody":"Blades of Glory is the story of Chazz Michael Michaels (Ferrel) and Jimmy MacElroy (Heder), two rival ice skaters banned from competition after a podium brawl at an "Olympic" event. After Jimmy's stalker finds a loophole in the rulebook (yes, you read that right), the pair join forces to reclaim their rightful position at the top of the skating rankings.

While it follows the predictable rise, fall, and rise again pattern of most comedies, Blades of Glory is different enough to be memorable. The costumes are ridiculous, the set-pieces are brilliant (including a very awkward chase sequence involving a crossbow and an unfortunate mascot), and the performances, what these films hinge on, are excellent.

The Ferrel-Heder exchanges are drenched with homoeroticism, and their struggles to come to terms with each other's lifestyles (Ferrel: "I'm a sex addict. It's my cross to bear" and Heder: "If you can dream it, you can do it!") are funny enough to carry the film for large sections. The supporting performances of the Waldenbergs (Will Arnett, Amy Poelher, and Jenna Fischer) fill in the gaps successfully, their conversations charged with an unusual mix of villainy and incestuous desire. Then of course there are the skating scenes, which are quite a sight to behold, in all their spandex-and-diamonds splendour.

Overall, Blades of Glory is hilarious. Pretty much every aspect of it is fantastically overblown, and it keeps you laughing quite steadily for its 90-minute running time. Boom!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":162766,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Sport"],"datePublished":"2007-05-30","keywords":"homoeroticism,gay interest,lgbt,jock strap,tattooed back","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blades of Glory","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3468296473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTU2YmYxMzUtZDk5Yy00YTU0LWJhMjUtZjY1MjUzMjJhNWIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTU2YmYxMzUtZDk5Yy00YTU0LWJhMjUtZjY1MjUzMjJhNWIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Paramount"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002071/","name":"Will Ferrell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1417647/","name":"Jon Heder"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0688132/","name":"Amy Poehler"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0330347/","name":"Josh Gordon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0817447/","name":"Will Speck"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0039303/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0158519/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1829796/","name":"Jeff Cox"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1837763/","name":"Craig Cox"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1014365/","name":"John Altschuler"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Blinded by the Light
Blinded by the Light. Siła muzyki
Blinded by the Light
programme.desc:
Blinded by the Light: Directed by Gurinder Chadha. With Billy Barratt, Ronak Singh Chadha Berges, Viveik Kalra, Lee Barnett. In England in 1987, a teenager from an Asian family learns to live his life, understand his family and find his own voice through the music of American rock star Bruce Springsteen." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8266310/","name":"Blinded by the Light","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDUzNGYxZDAtZjVjZC00YzI2LTk3MTItNmE3NGQwOWQwZjJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjcyMzI2OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"In England in 1987, a teenager from an Asian family learns to live his life, understand his family and find his own voice through the music of American rock star Bruce Springsteen.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8266310/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Vic_max"},"dateCreated":"2019-08-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Race, Religion and Rock N' Roll ... in 1987","reviewBody":"This story is inspired by writer Sarfraz Manzoor's autobiography.

Without really giving anything away, t's basically a story about the struggles of young college writer in a small English town. In the midst of his family's downward financial spiral ... and race relation issues of the time, he finds unexpected inspiration in the music and words of Bruce Springsteen.

It's mostly charming and has a good, heart-felt message. I like Springsteen's music but felt that the movie over-used it with all the Bolllywood-ish singing and dancing.

That said, it's amazing this movie even got made. Springsteen has never given permission for his music to be used in movies ... but he read Manzoor's book (before he was even approached) and give his approval.

There are some really enjoyable moments ... and there are times when the movie seemed to drag a bit. All in all - I liked it!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":22868,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2019-08-09","keywords":"aspiring writer,british pakistani,bruce springsteen fan,1980s,title based on song","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2113518617","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOThkMThiNTYtNjI0MC00YWFkLTg1YjQtNjVkYzg2MWZhODJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOThkMThiNTYtNjI0MC00YWFkLTg1YjQtNjVkYzg2MWZhODJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"From writer/director/producer Gurinder Chadha ('Bend It Like Beckham') comes the inspirational drama 'Blinded by the Light,' set to the music and lyrics of Bruce Springsteen’s timeless songs."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7811397/","name":"Billy Barratt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9161436/","name":"Ronak Singh Chadha Berges"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9196203/","name":"Viveik Kalra"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0149446/","name":"Gurinder Chadha"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0390775/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209925/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1876954/","name":"Sarfraz Manzoor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0149446/","name":"Gurinder Chadha"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0074488/","name":"Paul Mayeda Berges"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 8266310, Title: Blinded by the Light, --- Description: Blinded by the Light: Directed by Gurinder Chadha. With Billy Barratt, Ronak Singh Chadha Berges, Viveik Kalra, Lee Barnett. In England in 1987, a teenager from an Asian family learns to live his life, understand his family and find his own voice through the music of American rock star Bruce Springsteen." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8266310/","name":"Blinded by the Light","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDUzNGYxZDAtZjVjZC00YzI2LTk3MTItNmE3NGQwOWQwZjJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjcyMzI2OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"In England in 1987, a teenager from an Asian family learns to live his life, understand his family and find his own voice through the music of American rock star Bruce Springsteen.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8266310/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Vic_max","dateCreated":"2019-08-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Race, Religion and Rock N' Roll ... in 1987","reviewBody":"This story is inspired by writer Sarfraz Manzoor's autobiography.

Without really giving anything away, t's basically a story about the struggles of young college writer in a small English town. In the midst of his family's downward financial spiral ... and race relation issues of the time, he finds unexpected inspiration in the music and words of Bruce Springsteen.

It's mostly charming and has a good, heart-felt message. I like Springsteen's music but felt that the movie over-used it with all the Bolllywood-ish singing and dancing.

That said, it's amazing this movie even got made. Springsteen has never given permission for his music to be used in movies ... but he read Manzoor's book (before he was even approached) and give his approval.

There are some really enjoyable moments ... and there are times when the movie seemed to drag a bit. All in all - I liked it!","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":22868,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2019-08-09","keywords":"aspiring writer,british pakistani,bruce springsteen fan,1980s,title based on song","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2113518617","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOThkMThiNTYtNjI0MC00YWFkLTg1YjQtNjVkYzg2MWZhODJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOThkMThiNTYtNjI0MC00YWFkLTg1YjQtNjVkYzg2MWZhODJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"From writer/director/producer Gurinder Chadha ('Bend It Like Beckham') comes the inspirational drama 'Blinded by the Light,' set to the music and lyrics of Bruce Springsteen’s timeless songs.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7811397/","name":"Billy Barratt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9161436/","name":"Ronak Singh Chadha Berges","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9196203/","name":"Viveik Kalra"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0149446/","name":"Gurinder Chadha"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0390775/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209925/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1876954/","name":"Sarfraz Manzoor","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0149446/","name":"Gurinder Chadha","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0074488/","name":"Paul Mayeda Berges"],"duration":"PT1H58M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: H Is for Happiness
Szczęściara
H Is for Happiness
programme.desc: H Is for Happiness: Directed by John Sheedy. With Miriam Margolyes, Daisy Axon, Alessandra Tognini, Talissa Mansfield. A twelve year old girl with boundless optimism and a unique view of the world, is inspired by the strange new boy at school and sets out to mend her broken family - whatever it takes." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6943854/","name":"H Is for Happiness","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTM0YjIwOWItNjllOC00YjRlLTgwZDEtOTQxYzE4ZjRhMGI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjI3NzU3ODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A twelve year old girl with boundless optimism and a unique view of the world, is inspired by the strange new boy at school and sets out to mend her broken family - whatever it takes.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6943854/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"SnoopyStyle"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"cute sweet sincere","reviewBody":"Candice Phee is an outspoken 13 year old who gets ridiculed by the rest of the class especially mean girl Jen Marshall. Despite her aggressive happiness, her home life is dysfunctional. Her mother is depressed after the death of Candice's baby sister three years earlier. Her father is angry at his rich brother whom he believes to have stolen his great idea. New kid Douglas Benson believes that he's from another dimension and falls for Candice right away. Their wonky-eyed teacher assigns the class project Life as an Alphabet.\n\nThis is cute. I don't recognize any of the actors although Emma Booth seems familiar. The kids are newcomers. Daisy Axon has the eagerness even if she's unpolished. The acting is generally fine with good sincerity. The story is a little over-stuffed. It seems every character has a story in this movie. This is cute, sweet, and sincere. The filmmaking is good. With so many things going on, the emotional arc gets a bit muddled but the sweetness is never far away. That has a lot to do with little Daisy.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":445,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"genre":["Family"],"datePublished":"2020-02-06","keywords":"broken family,12 year old girl,happiness,school,boy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3579887385","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxOWI4MGEtNzBlZS00YWZjLWIzZTgtZTkwZjg1Njg1OTFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxOWI4MGEtNzBlZS00YWZjLWIzZTgtZTkwZjg1Njg1OTFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0546816/","name":"Miriam Margolyes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10249083/","name":"Daisy Axon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10295401/","name":"Alessandra Tognini"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2368564/","name":"John Sheedy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0261726/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0692057/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1124469/","name":"Lisa Hoppe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11812666/","name":"Barry Jonsberg"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

Nackte Tiere
programme.desc: Nackte Tiere: Directed by Melanie Waelde. With Katrin Beckmann, Michelangelo Fortuzzi, Ulrike Hübschmann, Luna Arwen Krüger. Five young people in provincial Germany. programme.title: Ostatnia wyprawa
Dernière ligne droite
programme.desc: Ali (Ali Zali) ma na karku trzydzieści trzy lata. Jako samotny ojciec, obarczony wieloma obowiązkami, mieszka ze swoim pięcioletnim synem Amirem Hosseinem (Rastin Hajbabaee) w niewielkim domu w Teheranie. Bardzo brakuje tam kobiety. Ali na różne sposoby pragnie zrekompensować chłopcu brak matki. Wpada w kłopoty.

programme.title: Bik Eneich: Un fils
Syn
Bik Eneich
programme.desc: Bik Eneich: Un fils: Directed by Mehdi Barsaoui. With Sami Bouajila, Najla Ben Abdallah, Youssef Khemiri, Noomen Hamda. 11 year old Aziz needs a liver transplant after being seriously injured during a terrorist ambush while on holiday in 2011. At the hospital a family secret will be revealed." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10749760/","name":"Bik Eneich: Un fils","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGFlM2U3ZDItMDEzNC00YjhkLTkyMmUtMjY2Yjg1MDdiY2MyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjgzMjQ0MTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"11 year old Aziz needs a liver transplant after being seriously injured during a terrorist ambush while on holiday in 2011. At the hospital a family secret will be revealed.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10749760/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nairtejas"},"dateCreated":"2019-10-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"MAMI Review: Un Fils (5 Stars)","reviewBody":"Things take a virulently political turn in Un Fils (A Son) even though the father character utters in the first five minutes of this drama that he is not interested in politics. But that is exactly what the director wants to convey in this slow-paced investigative thriller which puts a Tunisian mother-father duo into a deep struggle when their son meets with an accident and is required an urgent liver transplantation, all at the light of political turmoil in the country. That politics takes interest in you and even travels with you inside your car when you are with your family even if you don't want it to. It is a story about the search for the truth where the characters are entirely human and capable of mistakes and where eventful pasts have now come back to haunt in the worst ways possible. A Son dwells on long shots and lots of symbolism where it puts the focus on the child and then erects mountains that are peaked by figures of mother and father. And then it asks you to do some guesswork until the climax which is slightly off the mark when you compare it with the first two acts. Charming performances by the actors and a passable depiction of familial struggle in times of medical crisis makes A Son a good watch. But not a great one due to a lack of technicalities, novelty, and a general sense of uneventfulness throughout. +1 for Tunisian cinema in 2019. TN.\n\n(Watched and reviewed at its India premiere at the 21st MAMI Mumbai Film Festival.)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":783,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-03-11","keywords":"troubled family,father son relationship,mother son relationship,husband wife relationship,tunisian lebanese production","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [English SUB]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi872529433","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmJhZTVhZWQtZmMzNC00NGRjLWJjOTMtZjY3ZGJlZTlmYzU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmJhZTVhZWQtZmMzNC00NGRjLWJjOTMtZjY3ZGJlZTlmYzU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0098793/","name":"Sami Bouajila"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5858261/","name":"Najla Ben Abdallah"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10923123/","name":"Youssef Khemiri"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5421179/","name":"Mehdi Barsaoui"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0039666/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0246993/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002052/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5421179/","name":"Mehdi Barsaoui"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

Sin-ui Ttal-eun Chum-eul Chun-da
programme.desc: Korea. Shin-mi, transpłciowa kobieta, tańczy w klubie gejowskim. Ma oddanych fanów i przyjaciół. Niestety świat, w którym nie ma szans poczuć się sobą, zaczyna się o nią upominać. Shin-mi dostaje wezwanie do wojska. Mimo wstydu chce walczyć o siebie pośród nieprzyjaznych ludzi.

Nackte Tiere
programme.desc: Nackte Tiere: Directed by Melanie Waelde. With Katrin Beckmann, Michelangelo Fortuzzi, Ulrike Hübschmann, Luna Arwen Krüger. Five young people in provincial Germany. They run into each other and away from each other. They kiss and they fight. It's their last winter together before they leave school, after that it's stay or go. A feature film debut of enormous intensity." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11162826/","name":"Nackte Tiere","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDYzZTU3MWItZmI1ZC00ZjljLTkzMDEtMjk1YTgyNjMwZjNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTk0NzAwOTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Five young people in provincial Germany. A feature film debut of enorm","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11162826/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"What to make of ...","reviewBody":"Life or this movie. Or of anything - of violence, of love, of relationships, of music? There are certain things here that develop and there is a connection between the characters. And it all feels like real life. Which either excites you or annoys you while watching it.\n\nHaving someone choke another character out, to be surprised when they stop reacting ... but there is context to everything of course. Doing courses in fighting to fight through life itself and have a certain motivation but also a certain degree of strength. Security forces call controversial agents to help save the city from thugs and also from the police itself." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10648192/","name":"A Divisão","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzE0OGYwYTMtMDAwYy00OWIyLThmZjUtOWEyODU2OWQxNWJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkzODUwNzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the 90s, Rio de Janeiro was shaken by a wave of kidnappings. Security forces call controversial agents to help save the city from thugs and also from the police itself.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10648192/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Tropa de ... abduction","reviewBody":"Ok I should not try to compare any movie coming from Brazil to the masterpiece (and I mean the sequel, although of course I also really liked the first Tropa de Elite movie too). This is a decent movie to say the least - and it is based on real events. So there is that for sure. And it is as down and gritty as you would it expect it to be.\n\nJust the first action scene ... there's no difference between this and a Hollywood Action movie with a similar theme. So no this is not polished, but not every movie needs that polish. The pacing could be a bit tighter, but that is a personal opinion on that, you may feel different. Overall more than decent and a testament on a certain period of time and what went down (more or less) in Brazil ...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":481,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-01-23","keywords":"police,kidnapping,brazilian police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1042708/","name":"Erom Cordeiro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1499052/","name":"Thelmo Fernandes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0314078/","name":"Vanessa Gerbelli"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0025241/","name":"Vicente Amorim"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0687479/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026273/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0473686/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0025241/","name":"Vicente Amorim"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5312404/","name":"Aurélio Aragão"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2032393/","name":"Gustavo Bragança"}],"duration":"PT2H14M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Midnight Express
Midnight Express
programme.desc: Midnight Express: Directed by Alan Parker. With Brad Davis, Irene Miracle, Bo Hopkins, Paolo Bonacelli. Billy Hayes, an American college student, is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and thrown into prison." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0077928/","name":"Midnight Express","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDU1MjQ0YWMtMWQ2MS00NTdmLTg1MGItNDA5NTNkNTRhOTIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Billy Hayes, an American college student, is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and thrown into prison.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0077928/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bodie"},"dateCreated":"2003-09-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"A good movie but keep in mind a near total fantasy.","reviewBody":"I like this movie a lot. I believe it is well done and is a movie that can be watched several times. However, as a person who has spent time in Turkey and read the book upon which the film is based, I know that it is a fictional story. It begins with a caption "a true story" but the only thing true about this movie is that someone named Billy Hayes was caught trying to smuggle a lot of hashish out of the country and was sent to jail. The events that supposedly happened to him in prison are fictional. I'm not saying that being in a Turkish prison is a good thing but the brutality presented is just plain fiction. Before you feel sorry for this guy remember that he was trying to smuggle drugs for re-sale in the US. Before you condemn Turkey remember that at the time Turkey was being pressured by the world community, particularly by the US, to do something about the drug flow coming out of the country. This is one movie that infuriates the Turkish government whenever it is shown and I believe rightly so because it caters to the notion that Turkey is some type or barbaric nation with a population that is incapable of human emotion or decency. Having lived in Turkey I know this to be totally false. In addition, with the exception of the skyline of Istanbul in the opening scene, none of the movie was filmed in Turkey. All of the Turks portrayed in the film, with the exception of the prosecutor, are Italian actors. The language spoken in the movie is not even Turkish for the most part. There are some phrases which are indeed Turkish but the majority of what is spoken is some other language. IMDb data; ttnr: 0077928, Title: Midnight Express, --- Description: Midnight Express: Directed by Alan Parker. With Brad Davis, Irene Miracle, Bo Hopkins, Paolo Bonacelli. Billy Hayes, an American college student, is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and thrown into prison." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0077928/","name":"Midnight Express","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDU1MjQ0YWMtMWQ2MS00NTdmLTg1MGItNDA5NTNkNTRhOTIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Billy Hayes, an American college student, is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and thrown into prison.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0077928/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"bodie","dateCreated":"2003-09-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"A good movie but keep in mind a near total fantasy.","reviewBody":"I like this movie a lot. I believe it is well done and is a movie that can be watched several times. However, as a person who has spent time in Turkey and read the book upon which the film is based, I know that it is a fictional story. It begins with a caption "a true story" but the only thing true about this movie is that someone named Billy Hayes was caught trying to smuggle a lot of hashish out of the country and was sent to jail. The events that supposedly happened to him in prison are fictional. I'm not saying that being in a Turkish prison is a good thing but the brutality presented is just plain fiction. Before you feel sorry for this guy remember that he was trying to smuggle drugs for re-sale in the US. Before you condemn Turkey remember that at the time Turkey was being pressured by the world community, particularly by the US, to do something about the drug flow coming out of the country. This is one movie that infuriates the Turkish government whenever it is shown and I believe rightly so because it caters to the notion that Turkey is some type or barbaric nation with a population that is incapable of human emotion or decency. Having lived in Turkey I know this to be totally false. In addition, with the exception of the skyline of Istanbul in the opening scene, none of the movie was filmed in Turkey. All of the Turks portrayed in the film, with the exception of the prosecutor, are Italian actors. The language spoken in the movie is not even Turkish for the most part. There are some phrases which are indeed Turkish but the majority of what is spoken is some other language. As I said however, I like this movie, in the same way that I like Star Trek; a great story but fiction none the less.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":76558,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"1978-08-10","keywords":"watching someone masturbate,social masturbation,bare chested male,1970s,woman exposing her breasts for a man","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Midnight Express","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2878734617","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWZhOTI3M2EtNGJlZC00OGY5LTk4YjgtOGZkZGE3MTY3ZTE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWZhOTI3M2EtNGJlZC00OGY5LTk4YjgtOGZkZGE3MTY3ZTE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Columbia Tristar","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001113/","name":"Brad Davis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0591968/","name":"Irene Miracle","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005019/","name":"Bo Hopkins"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000570/","name":"Alan Parker"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0032235/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000231/","name":"Oliver Stone","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0370907/","name":"Billy Hayes","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0388772/","name":"William Hoffer"],"duration":"PT2H1M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Friday's Child
Wolny duch
Friday's Child
programme.desc:
Friday's Child: Directed by A.J. Edwards. With Tye Sheridan, Imogen Poots, Caleb Landry Jones, Jeffrey Wright. Fresh out of foster care at age 18, a young drifter turns to petty crime to survive, and discovers an impossible love in an unlikely friend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5342090/","name":"Friday's Child","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTViMWFhNjEtODgxMy00MWQ0LWI0M2MtYTdhNTE5NWM3NGFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTUyMzY1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Fresh out of foster care at age 18, a young drifter turns to petty crime to survive, and discovers an impossible love in an unlikely friend.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5342090/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TxMike"},"dateCreated":"2020-07-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Turning 18 and not totally prepared for adult life.","reviewBody":"This is a small, independent movie. It is mostly set in Waco, Texas and mostly shot there. I recognized some of the areas from my several visits a few years back. They even have a scene of throwing tortillas off the Waco Suspension Bridge, a ritual most Baylor college students go through.

Texas native Tye Sheridan is the main character, Richie, an orphan who has banged around the foster system for most of his life. He is just turning 18 and as such will be emancipated. But how prepared is a barely educated 18-yr-old to jump right into adult life?

This story is about that difficulty and the eventual trouble he finds himself in. It is hard to find a real purpose for this movie other than to tell an interesting fictional story but one which may be close to reality for some in a similar situation.

IMDb data; ttnr: 5342090, Title: Friday's Child, --- Description: Friday's Child: Directed by A.J. Edwards. With Tye Sheridan, Imogen Poots, Caleb Landry Jones, Jeffrey Wright. Fresh out of foster care at age 18, a young drifter turns to petty crime to survive, and discovers an impossible love in an unlikely friend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5342090/","name":"Friday's Child","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTViMWFhNjEtODgxMy00MWQ0LWI0M2MtYTdhNTE5NWM3NGFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTUyMzY1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Fresh out of foster care at age 18, a young drifter turns to petty crime to survive, and discovers an impossible love in an unlikely friend.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5342090/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"TxMike","dateCreated":"2020-07-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Turning 18 and not totally prepared for adult life.","reviewBody":"This is a small, independent movie. It is mostly set in Waco, Texas and mostly shot there. I recognized some of the areas from my several visits a few years back. They even have a scene of throwing tortillas off the Waco Suspension Bridge, a ritual most Baylor college students go through.

Texas native Tye Sheridan is the main character, Richie, an orphan who has banged around the foster system for most of his life. He is just turning 18 and as such will be emancipated. But how prepared is a barely educated 18-yr-old to jump right into adult life?

This story is about that difficulty and the eventual trouble he finds himself in. It is hard to find a real purpose for this movie other than to tell an interesting fictional story but one which may be close to reality for some in a similar situation.

My wife and I watched this at home on DVD from our public library, however she abandoned it when things got a bit weird in the middle of the movie.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":832,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-11-22","keywords":"love,foster care,orphan,abandonment issues,emancipation","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Friday's Child","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2967650073","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWMyZGEyYzYtN2IxYi00YTgwLTlmN2EtYzhlNmExMGQ5MmE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWMyZGEyYzYtN2IxYi00YTgwLTlmN2EtYzhlNmExMGQ5MmE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4446467/","name":"Tye Sheridan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1782299/","name":"Imogen Poots","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2655177/","name":"Caleb Landry Jones"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2270935/","name":"A.J. programme.title: Vice
Vice
programme.desc: Vice: Directed by Adam McKay. With Christian Bale, Amy Adams, Steve Carell, Sam Rockwell. The story of Dick Cheney, an unassuming bureaucratic Washington insider, who quietly wielded immense power as Vice President to George W. Bush, reshaping the country and the globe in ways that we still feel today." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6266538/","name":"Vice","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY1NjM0MzgxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDc4NTY0NjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of Dick Cheney, an unassuming bureaucratic Washington insider, who quietly wielded immense power as Vice President to George W. Bush, reshaping the country and the globe in ways that we still feel today.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6266538/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"danielledecolombie"},"dateCreated":"2018-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Laughing nervously","reviewBody":"In 2008, Italian director Paolo Sorrentino made a film about a, then, still living sinister political figure Giuliano Andreotti. The ferociousness of the portrait was acceptable to the public at large because it was presented as a stylish, slightly surreal comedy. Adam McKay sets VICE in a more realistic universe but the results are just as pungent, disturbing and funny. Christian Bale is spookily perfect. And Amy Adams is a modern day Lady Macbeth of major proportions. The most unsettling part of the whole experience, because Vice is an experience, is the knowledge that this are the people chosen by the people. The fact that countries have the governments they deserve gives me a chill in 2018. A remarkable film with remarkable performances. Bravo.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":132932,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-12-25","keywords":"u.s. vice president,iraq war,u.s. government,hit by a car,heart attack","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"30s Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1144502809","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNiMmEwZTYtOTM0OS00ODFkLWE4ZjItMDdlOTMyNjA4YmU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNiMmEwZTYtOTM0OS00ODFkLWE4ZjItMDdlOTMyNjA4YmU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000288/","name":"Christian Bale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0010736/","name":"Amy Adams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0136797/","name":"Steve Carell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0570912/","name":"Adam McKay"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0323215/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0186190/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136967/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0570912/","name":"Adam McKay"}],"duration":"PT2H12M"}</script><metacontent="

Nonajoler Kabbo
programme.desc: Nonajoler Kabbo: Directed by Rezwan Shahriar Sumit. With Fazlur Rahman Babu, Shatabdi Wadud, Titas Zia, Tasnova Tamanna. When a sculptor visits a remote fishing village on the Bangladeshi Delta, he finds himself center stage in a primal, elemental conflict between land and sea, man and nature, past and future." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6955210/","name":"Nonajoler Kabbo","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWEyNjM3NjYtNWI1Ni00NDY0LThhZDEtYjgyOWU0YWEzZTVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjM4NDY0MDA@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a sculptor visits a remote fishing village on the Bangladeshi Delta, he finds himself center stage in a primal, elemental conflict between land and sea, man and nature, past and future.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6955210/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MiguelAReina"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"More attractive in form than in substance","reviewBody":"The issue of the confrontation between the traditions of a small fishing village and a newly arrived sculptor is not original, but the film has a beautiful visual proposal, sustained in an excellent cinematography by Chananun Chotrungroj, which takes advantage of natural light and landscape. It is a film that is enjoyed in its form even though it does not contain a particularly attractive proposal.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":109,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-10-14","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2610419/","name":"Fazlur Rahman Babu"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2376908/","name":"Shatabdi Wadud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7645046/","name":"Titas Zia"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4081190/","name":"Rezwan Shahriar Sumit"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0199929/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0823106/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4081190/","name":"Rezwan Shahriar Sumit"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bones
Bones
Kości
Bones
programme.desc: Bones: Created by Hart Hanson. With Emily Deschanel, David Boreanaz, Michaela Conlin, T.J. Thyne. Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0460627/","name":"Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3ODMxMzM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM1NjU0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0460627/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Alison107"},"dateCreated":"2005-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just Hope It Stays On the Air","reviewBody":"I didn't expect to like it as much as I liked it. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. At times, it seemed far-fetched, and the whole Senator plot-point in the pilot seemed awful easy, but the dialogue worked, the characters intrigue me, and the chemistry is great. I expect good things from it.\n\nAlison"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":145903,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-09-13","keywords":"forensic anthropologist,investigation,washington d.c.,crime scene investigation,murder investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0221043/","name":"Emily Deschanel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174819/","name":"Michaela Conlin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0212869/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046572/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0361274/","name":"Hart Hanson"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bones: The Complete Seventh Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi748140825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Bones: The Complete Seventh Season"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0460627, Title: Bones, --- Description: Bones: Created by Hart Hanson. With Emily Deschanel, David Boreanaz, Michaela Conlin, T.J. Thyne. Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0460627/","name":"Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3ODMxMzM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM1NjU0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0460627/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Alison107","dateCreated":"2005-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just Hope It Stays On the Air","reviewBody":"I didn't expect to like it as much as I liked it. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. At times, it seemed far-fetched, and the whole Senator plot-point in the pilot seemed awful easy, but the dialogue worked, the characters intrigue me, and the chemistry is great. I expect good things from it.\n\nAlison","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":145903,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-09-13","keywords":"forensic anthropologist,investigation,washington d.c.,crime scene investigation,murder investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0221043/","name":"Emily Deschanel","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174819/","name":"Michaela Conlin"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0212869/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046572/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0361274/","name":"Hart Hanson"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bones: The Complete Seventh Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi748140825","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Bones: The Complete Seventh Season"</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0460627, Title: Bones, --- Description: Bones: Created by Hart Hanson. With Emily Deschanel, David Boreanaz, Michaela Conlin, T.J. Thyne. Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0460627/","name":"Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3ODMxMzM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM1NjU0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0460627/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Alison107","dateCreated":"2005-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just Hope It Stays On the Air","reviewBody":"I didn't expect to like it as much as I liked it. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. At times, it seemed far-fetched, and the whole Senator plot-point in the pilot seemed awful easy, but the dialogue worked, the characters intrigue me, and the chemistry is great. I expect good things from it.\n\nAlison","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":145903,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-09-13","keywords":"forensic anthropologist,investigation,washington d.c.,crime scene investigation,murder investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0221043/","name":"Emily Deschanel","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174819/","name":"Michaela Conlin"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0212869/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046572/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0361274/","name":"Hart Hanson"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bones: The Complete Seventh Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi748140825","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Bones: The Complete Seventh Season"</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0460627, Title: Bones, --- Description: Bones: Created by Hart Hanson. With Emily Deschanel, David Boreanaz, Michaela Conlin, T.J. Thyne. Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0460627/","name":"Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3ODMxMzM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM1NjU0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0460627/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Alison107","dateCreated":"2005-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just Hope It Stays On the Air","reviewBody":"I didn't expect to like it as much as I liked it. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. At times, it seemed far-fetched, and the whole Senator plot-point in the pilot seemed awful easy, but the dialogue worked, the characters intrigue me, and the chemistry is great. The Resident: Created by Amy Holden Jones, Hayley Schore, Roshan Sethi. With Matt Czuchry, Manish Dayal, Bruce Greenwood, Emily VanCamp. A group of doctors at Chastain Memorial Hospital face personal and professional challenges on a daily basis." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6483832/","name":"The Resident","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTc1MmE1NGYtMzFlYS00YTNmLThjNmEtMjQ5NzY4NmJkZTIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODkxMzcxOTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of doctors at Chastain Memorial Hospital face personal and professional challenges on a daily basis.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6483832/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"fatelovesthefearless"},"dateCreated":"2018-03-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Watch it for yourself! It's not bad!","reviewBody":"It's not the greatest medical drama and does not compare to ER as far as realism goes but as a nurse most of the medical stuff is correct and every show gets stuff wrong so don't not like a medical show because it's not 100% accurate. 

I like that they have taken this show on from a different angle - money and corruption! I don't live in the USA but I imagine this is actually quite accurate in the way hospitals are run and that it is all about money and not necessarily doing what's best for the patient. 

The characters so far are interesting - I'm 7 episodes in and I like that some patients are in it for longer than an episode. There are characters you want to root for the do gooders and there are characters you love to hate who are selfish, rich and really in the wrong business. Oh and there's a main character that's a nurse which is always a plus since we basically make the hospitals run! 

So if you like medical dramas give it a go! I've seen them all - ER is the best, I've got a soft spot for Greys Anatomy even though sometimes it's ridiculous m, Code Black is great, Chicago Med is alright, The night shift was good. They are all entertaining so in my mind they do what they are suppose to!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21065,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-01-21","keywords":"two word title,atlanta georgia,georgia,hospital,medical","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0194516/","name":"Matt Czuchry"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2110485/","name":"Manish Dayal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339304/","name":"Bruce Greenwood"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0152181/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070636/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0683032/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0427468/","name":"Amy Holden Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2735698/","name":"Hayley Schore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6149734/","name":"Roshan Sethi"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 1 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi528529689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2RjODYyNTMtZTljZC00ZmViLWEzZmYtZjExNmM2Y2I2MTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2RjODYyNTMtZTljZC00ZmViLWEzZmYtZjExNmM2Y2I2MTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Resident" follows Dr. Conrad Hawkins, one of the best doctors at Chastain Park Memorial Hospital. programme.title: Gone in Sixty Seconds
60 sekund
Gone in Sixty Seconds
programme.desc:
Gone in Sixty Seconds: Directed by Dominic Sena. With Nicolas Cage, Giovanni Ribisi, Angelina Jolie, T.J. Cross. A retired master car thief must come back to the industry and steal fifty cars with his crew in one night to save his brother's life." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0187078/","name":"Gone in Sixty Seconds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTIwMzExNDEwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwODMxMzg2._V1_.jpg","description":"A retired master car thief must come back to the industry and steal fifty cars with his crew in one night to save his brother's life.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0187078/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bowmanblue"},"dateCreated":"2017-01-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Gone, but not forgotten","reviewBody":"Also, poor Nicholas Cage, I knew him well... Once upon a time (possibly in Las Vegas) he was a Box Office heavyweight. Now... well, you can probably pick up one of his latest films from those buckets you find of DVDs for £2.99 in petrol stations. However, before his decent into depressingly-bad cinema, he made some pretty fun films. Yes, he's won an Oscar in his time for his deep and meaningful acting, but you won't find any of that here. Just fun.

Nicholas Cage plays (basically) Nicholas Cage – only a Nicholas Cage who used to steal expensive cars, only to retire. However, his loose cannon of a brother steals (or doesn't steal – I forget – it doesn't matter!) for (or from) the wrong mobster in L.A. meaning Nicholas Cage the now not-so retired car thief must steal a load of flash motors in one night or his brother ends up in the car crusher (literally!).

If you like fast cars driving even faster (and, judging by the 'Fast and the Furious' franchise a lot of people do) then this one is basically for you. It's an action film and it's pretty much by the numbers, but, when it's such fun, who cares? Everyone cranks their performances up to eleven and it all comes across as one of those adorable eighties and nineties 'over-the-top' action flicks (yes, I know it was made it in 2000, but it sure feels like a nineties movie) with a real cartoony vibe to it. You have Christopher Ecleston plays the 'evil Brit villain' much like any other evil Brit villains you've seen in cinema. Vinnie Jones and Angelina Jolie are on hand to show their faces, but feel a little underused for what they could have been.

Ultimately, it's all on Nicholas Cage's manic shoulders and he does the film proud. It's loud, dumb and it's basically one long car crash that you'll probably be unable to tear your eyes away from.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":267980,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2000-06-09","keywords":"auto theft,car,brother,thief,theft","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000115/","name":"Nicolas Cage"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000610/","name":"Giovanni Ribisi"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0784061/","name":"Dominic Sena"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049348/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026281/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355181/","name":"H.B. Halicki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003298/","name":"Scott Rosenberg"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

Jurassic Park III
programme.desc: Jurassic Park III: Directed by Joe Johnston. With Sam Neill, William H. Macy, Téa Leoni, Alessandro Nivola. A decidedly odd couple with ulterior motives convince Dr. Grant to go to Isla Sorna for a holiday, but their unexpected landing startles the island's new inhabitants." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0163025/","name":"Jurassic Park III","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDMyZGJjOGItYjJkZC00MDVlLWE0Y2YtZGIwMDExYWE3MGQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDYyMDk5MTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A decidedly odd couple with ulterior motives convince Dr. Grant to go to Isla Sorna for a holiday, but their unexpected landing startles the island's new inhabitants.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0163025/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"KoolCatReviews"},"dateCreated":"2020-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Always slightly under rated compared to the squel","reviewBody":"I have always felt this movie was better than the second although not as good as the original. This movie is defiantly more in-touch with the original than the second. The characters are likeable and the plot works. The ending though feels rushed, almost like they ran out of budget. Having Sam Neil back in the driving seat improves the film vastly. A Sunday viewing classic worthy to have been the sequel.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":304980,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2001-09-26","keywords":"dinosaur,costa rica,cgi animal in live action title,spinosaurus,island","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Jurassic Park Trilogy","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2525535257","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY5NzcwMDE4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTY1MDg3NQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY5NzcwMDE4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTY1MDg3NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Jurassic Park, The Lost World: Jurassic Park and Jurassic Park III debut as a trilogy set on Blu-rayÂ™ October 25, 2011."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000554/","name":"Sam Neill"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000513/","name":"William H. A Sunday viewing classic worthy to have been the sequel.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":304980,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2001-09-26","keywords":"dinosaur,costa rica,cgi animal in live action title,spinosaurus,island","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Jurassic Park Trilogy","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2525535257","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY5NzcwMDE4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTY1MDg3NQ@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY5NzcwMDE4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTY1MDg3NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Jurassic Park, The Lost World: Jurassic Park and Jurassic Park III debut as a trilogy set on Blu-rayÂ™ October 25, 2011.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000554/","name":"Sam Neill","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000513/","name":"William H. programme.desc: Bones: Created by Hart Hanson. With Emily Deschanel, David Boreanaz, Michaela Conlin, T.J. Thyne. Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0460627/","name":"Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3ODMxMzM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM1NjU0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0460627/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Alison107"},"dateCreated":"2005-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just Hope It Stays On the Air","reviewBody":"I didn't expect to like it as much as I liked it. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. At times, it seemed far-fetched, and the whole Senator plot-point in the pilot seemed awful easy, but the dialogue worked, the characters intrigue me, and the chemistry is great. I expect good things from it.\n\nAlison"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":145903,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-09-13","keywords":"forensic anthropologist,investigation,washington d.c.,crime scene investigation,murder investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0221043/","name":"Emily Deschanel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174819/","name":"Michaela Conlin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0212869/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046572/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0361274/","name":"Hart Hanson"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bones: The Complete Seventh Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi748140825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Bones: The Complete Seventh Season"}}</script><metacontent="

In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters.
